00011 typedef short (*fretint)(void *, ...);  /* kludge to cast to function returning int */
00012 typedef short (*eachdomethod)(void *, ...);
00013 typedef long (*exprmethod)(void *, ...);
00014 typedef long (*fptr)(void *, ...);

00016 
00017 #define clock_free freeobject

00019 #define wind_free freeobject
00020 
00021 #define ASSIST_INLET 1
00022 #define ASSIST_OUTLET 2
00023 
00024 /**
00025     This macro being defined means that getbytes and sysmem APIs for memory management are unified.
00026     This is correct for Max 5, but should be commented out when compiling for old max targets.
00027     @ingroup memory
00028 */
00029 #define MM_UNIFIED
